properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 4:17AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 40 kt and highest waves around 14
feet possible.

* WHERE...5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI
including Bois Blanc Island.

* WHEN...For the SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY, until 6 AM EST early this
morning. For the GALE WATCH, from Saturday afternoon through
late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous highest waves which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and highest
waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT
